## UserAgent.start() method

Connect user agent to network transport.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
start(): Promise<void>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<void>`

## Remarks

Connect to the WS server if status = STATUS\_INIT. Resume UA after being closed.
